snippet: Dow Jones industrial average gained 5.8 percent, its strongest January since 1994, and the S.& P. 500 rose 5 percent, its best start since 1997.
abstract: Stocks rally as lawmakers reach fiscal deal; Dow Jones industrial average and Standard & Poor's 500-stock index finish their best January in more than a decade.
lead_paragraph: Dow Jones industrial average gained 5.8 percent, its strongest January since 1994, and the S.& P. 500 rose 5 percent, its best start since 1997.

headline.seo: Dow and S.&P. 500 Have Best January Since 1990s
headline.main: 2 Major Indexes Have Best January Since 1990s
headline.print_headline: 2 Major Indexes Have Best January Since 1990s
